name: Magma Shell
description: Ignite the molten lava in your veins, limiting incoming damage to 3% of your Max Health and dealing 347 Flame Damage to nearby enemies each second for 10 seconds.   When activated, nearby allies gain a damage shield for 100% of their Max Health for 10 seconds.
effectLines: When activated nearby allies gain a powerful damage shield.
coefDescription: Ignite the molten lava in your veins, limiting incoming damage to 3% of your Max Health and dealing $1 Flame Damage to nearby enemies each second for 10 seconds.   When activated, nearby allies gain a damage shield for 100% of their Max Health for 10 seconds.
rawDescription:

When activated, nearby allies gain a damage shield for <<4>>% of their Max Health for <<5>>.
